v0.1.10, 11/17/2013
- creating a wheel distribution
- adding optional dependency on setuptools for better package management

v0.1.9, 04/16/2013
- merging pull request to use native Django remote backend

v0.1.8, 1/26/2013 -- Allowing parameters to be passed to the get_oauth_authorization_url, and passing scope to facebook.

v0.1.7, 11/5/2012 -- Added django driven options and support for facebook using facebook-sdk

v0.1.6, 11/2/2012 -- Added support for twitter using twython

v0.1.3, 11/2/2012 -- Initial release.
